## perpendicularCW variable

2D only. Produces a clockwise perpendicular vector to `v`<!-- -->, i.e. `[y,-x]`<!-- -->. Assumes positive Y-up.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
perpendicularCW: VecOpV
```
